results.description: Promotion hopefuls Preston end Huddersfield's seven-match unbeaten run with a comfortable home win the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Preston cruise to win over Huddersfield
results.title: Preston North End 3-1 Huddersfield Town: Promotion hopefuls end Terriers' unbeaten run

thumbnail.altText: Alan Browne scores Preston's second goal

results.description: Huddersfield Town's resurgence under new manager Danny Cowley continues as they beat Brentford.
results.shortTitle: Grant goal extends Terriers' good run
results.title: Brentford 0-1 Huddersfield Town: Karlan grant extends Terriers' unbeaten run to seven games

results.description: Barnsley caretaker boss Adam Murray warns they could be "eaten up" by the Championship after defeat at Huddersfield.
results.shortTitle: Barnsley must 'man up' after Terriers loss
results.title: Huddersfield Town 2-1 Barnsley: Terriers unbeaten in six games after home win

thumbnail.altText: Adam Murray gestures to his Barnsley players

results.description: Huddersfield Town miss the chance to climb out of the Championship relegation zone as they are held by Middlesbrough.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield held by Middlesbrough
results.title: Huddersfield Town 0-0 Middlesbrough: Terriers miss chance to climb out of relegation zone

thumbnail.altText: Lewis O'Brien of Huddersfield Town and Dael Fry of Middlesbrough

results.description: Juninho Bacuna comes off the bench to score for the third game running as Huddersfield battle back to draw at Blackburn.
results.shortTitle: Bacuna earns Terriers draw at Blackburn
results.title: Blackburn Rovers 2-2 Huddersfield Town: Juninho Bacuna scores again off the bench

results.description: Huddersfield Town record back-to-back wins for the first time since April as they beat Hull City 3-0 in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Bacuna inspires Huddersfield win over Hull
results.title: Huddersfield Town 3-0 Hull City: Juninho Bacuna inspires Terriers to second victory

results.description: Huddersfield beat Stoke to register their first win since February and increase the pressure on Potters boss Nathan Jones.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield beat bottom side Stoke
results.title: Stoke City 0-1 Huddersfield Town: Nathan Jones under more pressure after Terriers win

results.description: Huddersfield end a seven-game losing run in all competitions but have to settle for a point against 10-man Millwall.
results.shortTitle: Terriers off bottom with Millwall draw
results.title: Huddersfield Town 1-1 Millwall: Terriers end losing run with home draw

results.description: Huddersfield Town sign former Leicester City right-back Danny Simpson until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield sign defender Simpson
results.title: Danny Simpson: Huddersfield Town sign ex-Leicester City right-back

results.description: Boss Danny Cowley says Huddersfield have "forgotten how to win" after the Championship strugglers lost at West Brom, having led twice.
results.shortTitle: Terriers have 'forgotten how to win'
results.title: West Bromwich Albion 4-2 Huddersfield Town: Unbeaten Baggies extend Terriers' winless start

results.description: Relive West Bromwich Albion's comeback victory over struggling Huddersfield Town in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Championship: West Brom come from behind to beat winless Huddersfield - as it happened
results.title: West Bromwich Albion v Huddersfield Town live in the Championship

results.description: Garry Monk's Sheffield Wednesday win at Huddersfield, whose first game under Danny Cowley ends in defeat.
results.shortTitle: Owls make winning start under Monk
results.title: Huddersfield Town 0-2 Sheffield Wednesday: Garry Monk makes winning start as Owls boss

results.description: Leeds go top of the Championship and Sheffield Wednesday win under new boss Garry Monk - relive the action as it happened.
results.shortTitle: Relive Sunday's wins for Leeds and Sheffield Wednesday
results.title: Championship live: Huddersfield v Sheffield Wednesday & Barnsley v Leeds

results.description: New Huddersfield Town boss Danny Cowley admits it would have been "safer" to stay at previous club Lincoln City.
results.shortTitle: Cowley excited by Terriers challenge
results.title: Danny Cowley: Huddersfield Town boss 'wants to be challenged'

results.description: Championship strugglers Huddersfield Town appoint Lincoln City boss Danny Cowley as their new manager.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield appoint Cowley as manager
results.title: Danny Cowley: Huddersfield Town appoint Lincoln City boss as manager

results.description: Huddersfield Town are fined by the Football Association after wearing a kit that breached advertising regulations.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield fined for kit rule breach
results.title: Huddersfield Town given FA fine after Paddy Power kit breaks advertising rules

results.description: Huddersfield Town offer former Scunthorpe, Southampton and Hull City boss Nigel Adkins their managerial vacancy, reports BBC Radio Leeds.
results.shortTitle: Adkins offered Huddersfield job
results.title: Huddersfield Town offer Nigel Adkins managerial role, reports BBC Radio Leeds

results.description: Huddersfield Town sell Dutch winger Rajiv van La Parra to Serbian side Red Star Belgrade for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Terriers sell Van La Parra to Red Star
results.title: Rajiv van La Parra: Huddersfield Town sell Dutch winger to Red Star Belgrade

thumbnail.altText: Rajiv Van La Parra scored seven times in 101 appearances for Huddersfield following his arrival from Wolves on loan in March 2016

results.description: Huddersfield Town stay level on points at the bottom of the Championship as Luton Town come from behind to win.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield misery continues at Luton
results.title: Luton Town 2-1 Huddersfield Town: Luton secure back-to-back league wins

results.description: Huddersfield midfielder Abdelhamid Sabiri has his contract terminated by mutual consent.
results.shortTitle: Midfielder Sabiri leaves Huddersfield
results.title: Abdelhamid Sabiri: Huddersfield Town midfielder departs by mutual consent
